article.title: L-3 to Provide Flight Trainers to Malaysia
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: L-3 Communications Corporation, Arlington, Texas, is being awarded a $19,534,384 firm-fixed-price contract for one each tactical operational flight trainer, a brief/debrief station including logistical support for the Royal Malaysian Air Force under the Foreign Military Sales Program. Work will be performed in Arlington, Texas, and Malaysia, and is expected to be completed in April 2015. The Naval Air Warfare Center Training Systems Division, Orlando, Florida, is the contracting activity.
